content: have your finished dinosaur thank you for your purchase if you have any questions or concerns please email me at sweetoddityart@gmail com or etsy convo me i will get back to you asap please share your finished dinosaur with me as often as you want i love seeing them sweet oddity art 9 helpful tips exact colors used 1 blue premier parfait chunky light blue 2 pink premier parfait chunky bubblegum 3 teal premier parfait chunky lagoon you can use different eye sizes you might have to adjust the placements if you change the sizes you can use different hook sizes and weights of yarn it will just change the size of your dino and you might need to adjust eye placement how you stuff matters the type of stuffing you use how you stuff all this matters on how your dino turns out i prefer polyfil stuffing but you can use other types sweet oddity art 10
